name: In the night alone
description:
In the night alone is a short horror visual novel that is made using using Ren'py. It has a few choices to choose from but has only ONE ending.

" This is a story about a guy who is preparing his usual in a rainy night, until a knock on his door will make his night a little bit more interesting.... "

This is my first time actually finishing a game and making a visual novel! So it may look a little.. awkward and ugly for most people. Although I'm satisfied with the output! This visual novel took 2 days to finish. (One day took the story and the art and the other day with coding)
